title: Box T-shirt
desc: This black Our Legacy New Box cotton T-shirt is cut with a crew neck, short sleeves and loose, relaxed fit. We've always thought of ourselves as anything but basic, but when it comes to an Our Legacy tee, we'll make an exception.

title: Borrowed long-sleeved shirt
desc: Coined the 'Borrowed' shirt due to its worn-in feel, Our Legacy presents this long-sleeved shirt in a relaxed, slouchy silhouette. Woven from a soft cotton blend, this iteration arrives in a pink-toned plaid pattern.

title: Gilmore check shirt
desc: Produced in an Italian viscose and cotton blend checked fabric, this long-sleeve shirt from Our Legacy shows the brand's Scandinavian cool style. Its design has a slightly oversized cut and is enhanced with mother of pearl buttons.

title: Elder checked short-sleeve shirt
desc: Reimagined for SS23 in a beige iteration, Our Legacy's Elder shirt is crafted from a crisp lightweight blend of linen and elevated with a subtle check pattern throughout - a nod to the brand's penchant for understated and streetwear-inspired designs.

title: high-shine biker jacket
desc: high-shine biker jacket from OUR LEGACY featuring black, leather, high-shine finish, classic collar, off-centre front zip fastening, zip detail, long sleeves and straight hem.

title: Third Cut iridescent foil jeans
desc: Crafted in a free-spirited wide-leg silhouette, these Third Cut jeans from Our Legacy emphasise their eccentric character through the all-over iridescent foiled finish.

title: button-up shirt jacket
desc: You know that jacket you can always rely on? Crafted from black cotton so you can wear it with anything, this shirt jacket will add a casual touch to your outfits. Where will this Our Legacy piece take you?

title: panelled ankle boots
desc: Our Legacy's ankle boots are designed with comfort in mind. Set on sturdy rubber soles, this panelled iteration is lined with plush shearling.

title: Borrowed BD long-sleeve shirt
desc: Our Legacy updates its signature Borrowed BD shirt in a fluid cotton blend fabrication. The lightweight design is rendered in the brand's Columbia check pattern, while the dropped shoulder seams add to its relaxed feel.

title: Duffel single-breasted parka
desc: Effortless in style, the Duffel parka from Our Legacy is designed for a relaxed fit. Imagined in a moss green hue, this piece boasts a classic hood and leather buttons that are designed to distress over time and develop a unique patina with wear.
